title.title: Find your team with just one click
title.description: Discover the perfect project or team to bring your ideas to life

content.p_first: We're a platform, designed for young and rising professionals.
content.p_second: Our goal is to help you easily find the right team and gain vital work experience.
content.p_third: We see great potential in every junior and aim to turn their career dreams, into reality.
content.p_last: Join us, and let's make a step toward tomorrow!

content.description_first: Jump-start your journey with us. Gain hands-on experience, sharpen your communication skills, and elevate your market competitiveness.
content.description_second: Launch your project and rally a team of like-minded people. Whether it's a pet- project or a startup, we've got you covered.
content.description_last: If mentoring appeals to you, come onboard. Assist newcomers through challenging times by providing guidance or offering helpful advice.

func.title: What awaits you on our platform?

content.description_first: Jump in with our ready-made project templates. We've set the foundation, allowing your team to start quickly without lengthy discussions. Each project includes a clear description and defined roles for everyone.
content.title_second: Opportunity to create your own project
content.description_second: Our platform empowers you to breathe life into your ideas. Build your team, and explore roles ranging from product manager to recruiter and beyond.
content.description_last: Our collection of tools is designed to enhance your work on projects. Keep an eye out for additional details coming soon!

tape.p: Don't miss out on thisexciting journey!
